title: (7830) Vale de Vargo -
description:
What could you get your teeth into in Monte das Louzeiras, near the Spanish border between Seville and Serpa? Wine and olive oil harvested on site from the olive grove with 250 year old trees and a vineyard... Petisco (local snacks)... Sunset drinks... A barbecue? Landscape-wise there is an equally tasty set-up with a 40 hectare olive grove in the Serra Adiça and animals such as sheep, horses, dogs, cats, geese, chickens, peacocks and an ostrich in the yard.

Hosts Ana Luisa, Marc and VIP resident Dunga the ostrich live on the farm. We produce wine in amphorae and oak barrels, but our shop has more than wine: olive oil, piri piri, honey, cosmetic products made from olive oil, vinegar and flavored salts and oils. We are a family business with Swiss and Portuguese roots - and we welcome you with open hearts and arms.

There is a good piece of nature at Monte das Louzeiras. In the patio, surrounded by orange and lemon trees, you can enjoy breakfast, petisco or even a barbecue. We are happy to serve you our wines and other drinks on the terrace with pool, even at sunset.

Relax in the palm park in the shade of palm trees and other trees, read a book in one of the hammocks, or play badminton, volleyball or boules. (the equipment is available).

The park is also perfect for yoga, pilates, tai-chi or meditation. Groups are also welcome.

When it comes to wine tasting and olive oil tasting you have two options: olive oil and wine tasting in our Amphorae-Adega which is one of the "rota do vinho de talha" or on the Alentejo Wine Route. For snacks you have a choice of those served on site or a cafe in the small village of Vale de Vargo, a 35 minute walk away.

Get all the groceries you need at the supermarket 10 minutes' drive away, then head to Serpa, 20 minutes' drive away. This small town offers cultural events and museums and is considered the capital of , a UNESCO-listed traditional Portuguese music genre.

title: (7220) Amieira - Unnamed Road

View the height of grass vehicles do not often come there. No shade no trees but a magnificent 360 degree view. Surely untenable in summer! Please ladies did not leave your papers of the little pee. It's so easy to put in the trash, and those for all outdoor spots, thank you!

title: (7830-647) Vila Verde de Ficalho - 49 Rua Francisco Relógio
title_short: (7830-647) Vila Verde de Ficalho - 49 Rua Francisco Relógio

OPEN

private house - motorhomes

where you can spend the night safely and in comfort. Our small park has all the services for those traveling by motorhome or caravan, without any cost. Only cleaning services is associated with the cost of 13 €. We are located in a small farm, next to the border with Spain. In a typical Alentejo village - Vila Verde de Ficalho - Serpa. Where you can stroll outdoors and enjoy the true taste of country life.

Visit us

WHERE THE AUTOCARAVANIST IS WELCOME

name: Parque De Pernoita De Autocaravanas
title: (7200-175) Parque De Pernoita De Autocaravanas
description: Free reasonable flat P dedicated to motorhomes, campers and caravans (according signal) between trees. Service area is in Telheiro village (follow road to N). The floor is a bit uneven, pebbles that will hardly be able to make you stay level, even with wedges. Wonderful panorama to E (nice sun rising) over Alqueva dam/lake and landscape. Walking access to historic medieval village. Note: just in front there is a free open space that extends over the breathtaking natural landscape, be careful if it rains to avoid getting bogged down.

title: (7240) Mourão -
description: Among the many marked parking lots, I recommend this open space that offers an enchanting view over the valley with the castle behind it. No service, except the waste bins in the street parking. For one night it is definitely worth it!

title: (7240) Mourão -
description: This is the observatory parking lot. However, the door is open and you can comfortably spend the night here. A visit to the observatory is worthwhile, to see the wonders of the universe.

title: (7200) Monsaraz - 3 Rua de São Bento
description: Monsaraz It is the parking lot of a hermitage demolished, just at the end of the village, above all. Follow the signs for hermitage of Sao Bento. It is much more discreet and beautiful than those below, as you have to cross the foot through narrow streets abstain very large motorhomes. You sleep in the viewpoint and you see a beautiful panoramic view of Mosaraz. Behind the Church the site is quieter.

title: (7200) - Unnamed Road
description: Calm night at the foot of the dolmens in an old olive grove. seen on monsaraz

title: (7960) Vila de Frades - N258
description: The day I came here, it was closed. I went to visit Vila de Frades and Vidigueira. The Museum of the ruins in V Frades was closed, the ethnographic in Vidigueira was open. The cuisine is very good based on large white bread, goat cheese, tomatoes, asparagus, aromatic herbs from the countryside, good sausages and red meat steaks. The space has no support but is very quiet and clean, since it only serves the ruins. A nearby farm has a pack of dogs that barked all night. Ruïnes closed on Mondays and Tuesday mornings.

title: (7200) Telheiro - 18 Rua da Fonte
description: Complete service area. Need to call in advance to pick up key. (Phone visible for park4night PRO users only)

title: (7220) Monte do Trigo - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near the dam, several possible locations, pebbles or grassy depending on the season. No service

title: (7200-173) Monsaraz - Rua do Convento
description:
This is a private farm space, surrounded by old stone walls, where the owner allows night stays in nature for travelers by motorhome, campervan or tent. 
You can choose your spacious pitch yourself in the shadow of the stone oaks and olive trees or in the sun. Wake up listening to the bird songs and the sounds of the Campo Alentejano!

 Watch our farm animals , which partly walk free.

Please call before arrival preferably via whatsup or email so that we can agree a time.

The service station for grey and black water is just 1 km away and also provides public toilets.

Check-in: 11h30-12h30 or 15h30-18h30 **
Check-out: 8h00-11h30

** Latest until 22h30 if pre-paid!

title: (7240) Mourão - CM 1127
description: A place with a lot of calm and tranquility ideal for spending the night and easily accessible, there is a post with a USB socket and picnic tables, a few meters from the cromlech of Jerez

title: (7800) Beja - 7800 Estrada das Apolinarias

title: (7200) Corval - 19 Rua da Escola
description: Biological property of 8 hectares which welcomes travelers (tents, converted vehicles, bungalows, tree houses. Ponies, sheep, hens, charming rural environment where children will enjoy themselves a lot. Space between pitches of at least 50 meters. Change of scenery guaranteed Exceptional welcome from the owners, who speak: - French - English - Portuguese - Spanish - Italian Sale of olive oil from the property!

Just a problem that many cars pass after 7 in the morning.

Passage of the police in the evening and in the morning, no problem. Another parking 500 m before the stadiums. Lots of traffic down the road but reasonable at night.

title: (7750) Mértola - Unnamed Road
description: Good place to park and make a small route and see the Pulo do Lobo waterfall.

title: (7800-522) Beja - BP Rua António Sardinha
description: LPG filling station with NL/UK filling nipple can be borrowed in the store.

title: (21560) Paymogo - HU-7400
description: Large parking lot by the river on the Spanish side of the border. Good to see from the bridge. With ample picnic area and information boards. A walk along the border river also starts here. There is also an old water mill by the river. Very quiet.

title: (7220) Santana - Unnamed Road
description: Lugar relativamente plano entre prados alentejanos com animais (vacas e cavalos) e o rio numa antiga barragem. optimo para relaxar a ouvir a natureza a sombra de oliveiras

title: (7230-033) Barrancos - 9 Rua Nova do Baldio
description: Parking next to the pool, soccer field and the theater. Very quiet. The squares above are level. 300 meters below there is an immense esplanade completely level between the pool and a pine forest. Free WIFI. In the center there are several restaurants and bars. In the town there is little to do, but the route to the castle of Noudar is interesting.

title: (7830) Montalvo - N265
description:
Super simple little village.
WC, public drinking water, waste and above all 2 restaurants. The real rural Portugal.

title: (06110) Villanueva del Fresno -
description: On an old bridge in nature! Have stood here overnight. Only one farmer happened to his farm. Beautiful old bridge! Top!

title: (7005) São Manços -
description: There is a level parking space by the old bridge. The bridge is no longer used, so to speak. Not recommended in midsummer as there is little shade.

title: (7220-301) Orjola - 11 Travess Nova
description: Absolutely perfect here??nice water very friendly people around????come and see yourself??

title: (7220) - Travessa da Cancela
description: Just see with your own eyes :)to avoid the village first round about on entering village take first right go down to lake turn left on road dirt track keep lake on right for about half a mile turn left and then right  (straight on) up road to next right go down past cemetery and your there it amazing

title: (7940) Vila Alva - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place in the middle of nature. Nice clear water. Good for swimming. Suitable for small vans, 4x4, silent. Also suitable for overnight stays. No further facilities, so bring garbage ?!

title: (7940) Vila Alva - Unnamed Road
description: Discreet place, possibility of sleeping by the water. Seen on the lake. No services Just no shade because no trees.

title: (7940) Vila Alva -
description: Place at the edge of the gravel road. A possible level place. Nice view of the lake and ?. Please keep clean. Also for motorhome up to 7m. Absolutely calm.

title: (21390) Encinasola -
description: Very quiet spot either to park for a few hours, go for a walk or have a quiet night. Zero facilities

title: (7940) Vila Alva - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful spot in the countryside, facing the lake. Possibility of nice walks. No service.

title: (21570) Santa Bárbara de Casa - 24 Avenida de Portugal
title_short: (21570) Santa Bárbara de Casa - 24 Avenida de Portugal
description: Parking to spend the night and visit the town of Santa Barbara from home. And you can also buy the famous cheese from the meadow! At the gas station.

title: (7800) Penedo Gordo - Rua das Cavadas
description: Peaceful place with fountain, tables and a small little river and good shadow and a beautiful roman aquedute.

title: (7800) Beja - Rua das Cavadas
description:
Nice spot in a little town with a lot of places to walk where you will discover nice fountains. Close to the coffes, markets and bakery. With a small playgrounds for Kids.
Ask about fonte das cavadas and ribeiro anda people will explains us how to go there, you can get free water from that 2 fountains.

title: (7800) Beja - Unnamed Road
description: Fluvial beach inaugurated in 2020. Two parking areas, one next to the bar and other facilities and another a little further away among the olive trees. Quiet and spacious place to take a good bath. There is no shade because the trees are newly planted.

title: (06105) Cheles -
description: Quietly located flat P 2 km away Cheles village and EX-325, at bottom of road, 300m before very small leisure crafts harbor (= “embarcadero”) even at riverside of Alqueva big artificial lake, with stunning views. All painted parking spaces are 7,5m long. Gravel path bordering water. Restaurant of “embarcadero” opens full day 1-July till mid September; remaining, only lunches on weekends.

name: Parque de Autocaravanas de Santiago Maior
title: (7200) Parque de Autocaravanas de Santiago Maior
title_short: (7200) Parque de Autocaravanas de Santiago Maior
description: ASA paid camperstop. Pre-book online at outdoor-routes.pt .  16 marked pitches. Picnic tables and play area next door. On the edge of a quiet village with a small supermarket and cafés.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Parking spot next to park he dam

title: (7750-170) Corte Do Pinto -
description: Very calm place to spend a few days.

title: (7250) - Unnamed Road
description: If you like staying alone in the nature, by the river side, this is a great location. There is water around, public toilets but no shades which in high summer could be painful. There’s also a bar at the beach. The way from the village Montejuntos to the spot is on the narrow side but good enough for Campers up to 8/9 meters.

title: (7005) São Manços - M534
description: Simple place where overnight stay is possible. Maybe a muddy pitch in rain but no problem with sun. dog can swim in the reservoir. Quite a nice and very quiet place.

title: (06105) Cheles - Unnamed Road
description: Caravan and motorhome private parking area on left Guadiana riverside (here Alqueva big dam/lake) on La Dehesa / Cheles beach, 4,5 km from Cheles village and EX-315 road. Bathing area, toilets, outdoor shower, beach bar. Ideal to cool down, at night in summer the temperature lowers and you sleep nicely. NOTES: there are two grid gates (to prevent animals moving) usually closed that you can open and close to cross; it is FORBIDDEN even to park outside this private area.

title: (7750) Achada do Gamo - Unnamed Road
description: Location ready lake without fisherman when we arrived. Very calm.

title: (7750) Mértola - Unnamed Road
description: Amazing spot, more private than the one’s just before. Nice and flat but not quite level. Sheltered from the prevailing wind. Very rough track to get here. Please leave this place cleaner than when you arrived and bury your human waste away from the water.

title: (7750) - Unnamed Road
description:
Place in the middle of nature much calmer than the carpark of the village
attention very damaged path on the end not possible for long vehicle or motorhome
it was limited with my little ducato

title: (7005) Nossa Senhora de Machede -
description: Nice spot on the lake for max. 2 campers. In the evening buzzing crickets and chirping birds as well as ringing cowbells in the distance. No mosquitoes in April 2023. Very quiet apart from a slight noise from the nearby water treatment plant. Access is a bit difficult for the last 200m, but in good weather it can be done well with a small van without a 4x4.

title: (7750-136) - 43 Rua da Escola
description: Wide parking to land outside the tourism corner below, shopkeeper and local very kind and welcoming

title: (7750) Sao Domingos - 20 Rua 1º de Maio
description: Land surrounded by eucalyptus with plenty of space for parking. Easy access from the main road and the most likely GNR trouble free zone as it is just a bit further from the water compared to the other locations. Close walking distance to the village and to the fluvial beach.

title: (7750) - 4 Rua 25 de Abril
description: Hot shower (and wc). There are 3 man cabins and 3 female cabins, but only one for each one works. No shower hoses and heads any more. There is also a water tap in the women's toilet. The doors do not lock. There is opening hours (8h-19h in Summer / 8-18h in winter).

title: () Minas de São Domingos - Rua Catarina Eufémia
title_short: () Minas de São Domingos - Rua Catarina Eufémia
description: Service station for motorhomes and camper. Only grays and blacks discharge. Drinking water not working, seems abandoned.

title: (7750) Mértola - Unnamed Road
description: Not recomended for big campers or anything other than 4x4 vehicles. It is a steep hill with cliffs to either side - not easy to turn around if you decide to make the journey down to the river. Just attached to Guadiana River in Canais. An old water mill and ancient fish trap. Amazing view. Very calm into the nature. Only the sound of the river running. We spent one night here. Amazing sky. No facilities. only a nice place for swim.

name: Camping Rosario(16+)
title: () Camping Rosario(16+)
description: Adults only (16+) Good small-scale campsite. Calm. Very clean. Pets allowed. Community barbecue and refrigerator. Swimming pool. Living room and library. It does not have a store. Very few seats for lunch and dinner. Payment in cash.

name: Parque de Autocaravanas
title: (7250) Parque de Autocaravanas
description: RV park with 2 flat pitches and all services. Access only through the website which is not easy unless you are pre-registered (try calling).

title: (7250-065) Terena - Senhora da Boa Nova
description: Spot at the Sanctuary of Nossa Senhora da Boa Nova. after the sanctuary downhill, left side, very good level ground. Very little rural traffic. Near the charming town of Terena.
